title: Create a Navigation Bar
description: Build a responsive navigation bar with logo and menu items

steps.instruction: Start with a flex container that takes full width
steps.hint: Use 'flex' for flexbox and any 'w-*' class for width (e.g., w-full)

steps.targetDesign: flex w-full bg-gray-800 px-6 py-4 items-center justify-between text-white
steps.hint: Add horizontal padding (px-*), vertical padding (py-*), and any background color (bg-*)

steps.instruction: Center items vertically and space them apart
steps.expectedClass: flex w-full px-6 py-4 bg-gray-800 items-center justify-between
steps.targetDesign: flex w-full bg-gray-800 px-6 py-4 items-center justify-between text-white
steps.hint: Add 'items-center' to center vertically and 'justify-between' to space items apart

title: Create a Card Component
description: Build a modern card with shadow and rounded corners

steps.instruction: Start with basic padding and background
steps.hint: Use any padding class (p-*) and any background class (bg-*)

steps.targetDesign: p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg max-w-md mx-auto text-black
steps.hint: Add any rounded class (rounded-* or just 'rounded') and any shadow class (shadow-*)

steps.instruction: Make it responsive with max width and center it
steps.expectedClass: p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg max-w-md mx-auto
steps.targetDesign: p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg max-w-md mx-auto text-black
steps.hint: Add any max-width class (max-w-*) and 'mx-auto' for centering
